scripts.build-all: cd ../CarConfigurator-UI && npm run build-all && cd ../CarConfigurator && npm install && npm link ../CarConfigurator-Lib && npm link ../CarConfigurator-UI && npm run build
scripts.build-dev-all: cd ../CarConfigurator-UI && npm run build-dev-all && cd ../CarConfigurator && npm install && npm link ../CarConfigurator-Lib && npm link ../CarConfigurator-UI && npm run build-dev
